roleset.name: look at

example.name: stalker?
example.text: If anyone wants to learn about model watching or how I know this is going to happen feel free to pm me.

roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to watch.01-v. Watch.01-v is a member of VN classes sight-30.2 and search-35.2. Watch.01-v is a member of FN class Being_awake. Framed by Katie.
